text: int main ( ) { long int n , h , x = 0 , output [ 1000 ] , i , j , k , sum = 0 ; long long int * * a ; scanf ( "%ld" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%ld" , & h ) ; * a = ( long long int * ) malloc ( h * ( h + 1 ) * ( h + 1 ) * sizeof ( long long int ) ) ; for ( j = 0 ; j < h ; j ++ ) { for ( k = 0 ; k <= j ; k ++ ) { scanf ( "%ld" , & a [ j ] [ k ] ) ; } } } for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j < h ; j ++ ) { for ( k = x ; k <= j ; k ++ ) { if ( j == 0 ) { sum = a [ j ] [ k ] ; } else { if ( a [ j ] [ k ] > a [ j ] [ k + 1 ] ) { sum = sum + a [ j ] [ k ] ; break ; } else { sum = sum + a [ j ] [ k + 1 ] ; x = k + 1 ; break ; } } } } output [ i ] = sum ; } for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { printf ( "%lli" , output [ i ] ) ; } return 0 ; }
